marklogic.body:
What a surprise. It could be that we all believe that carbon is causing the planet to Heat up so Shiver in unheated houses all winter.
More likely, unfettered takeovers permitting the number of utility providers to fall to just six who Act in a cartel so as to maximise profits is squeezing us into fuel poverty while our government refuses to instigate a rigorous investigaation into energy pricing and reverse the takeovers by breaking up the cartel and introducing competition. Instead it does nothing except utter fatuous remarks about 'global markets'.
